recipesJson.name: Strawberry Shortcake
recipesJson.author: enzonik
recipesJson.description: There’s a lot of flavor in this. I wanted the shortbread to come thru heavy with this so I went with the inw biscuit and butter. I needed creamy but not a heavy custard profile so I went with whipped cream and elevated it with tpa milk DX (not on atf so I just had to select tpa dairy milk). I put 2 different strawberries in it to elevate each other without being too overpowering. Topped it off with some supersweet to make it a little more “commercial”

reviews.text: I had to substitute regular tfa Bavarian cream instead of dx but it came out wonderful man. Very well balanced. Good job!
